import { useContext } from 'react' import { CartContext } from '../../contexts/cart.context' import './checkout.style.scss' const Checkout = () => { const { cartItems, increaseItem, decreaseItem, deleteItem } = useContext(CartContext) return (
Name
Description
Price
Quantity
Remove
{cartItems.map((item) => { const { name, id, price, quantity } = item return (

{name}

{quantity}
increaseItem(id)}>increment
decreaseItem(id)}>decrement
deleteItem(id)}>delete
) })} Total:0
) } export default Checkout
